NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: The Inspired has completed its orbit around the star system, collecting as much of the deadly matter as it is safely able to.
2
1
CASSAVA: The lifeforms within the Sanctuary are still deep in slumber. Once I finish this message, I shall voyage back to the Sanctuary to rest them on the quantum shard.
3
2
CASSAVA: When I give the order, the Inspired's structure will crush inwards, forcing all the collected deadly matter into the black hole at its core, destroying itself, and irradiating the Deep Storm Station.
4
3
CASSAVA: As I fade, my voyager will no longer be able to observe the quantum shard, delivering the lifeforms back to the decontaminated surface of Timber Hearth.
5 4
8 7
CASSAVA: My dearest hope is that these species will live on to explore and learn more from the universe.
9 8
CASSAVA: I only wish I could live to see their
10 9
CASSAVA: ... I am ready.
11 10
CASSAVA: In my final moments, I am filled with gratitude and admiration for all that I have been able to learn and experience.
12 11
CASSAVA: The universe I was born within, and the tiny window of its life that I glimpsed - has inspired boundless curiosity in me, with both its vast terror and vast beauty...
13 12
CASSAVA: May the universe to come... receive me swiftly!
Deep Storm Station ENTERED 1
INSP R4 1
